description: Manny is sporting a new look for the summer and looking good! Who better else to fuck him than big-dicked Randy? These two goofballs were so much fun to see hang out and play together in the pool. They seem so comfortable with each other, it’s almost as if they’ve been buds for a while. We asked Randy if he was going to take it easy on Manny, “I’m gonna try to, but sometimes it’s tough….I like to fuck hard, so that’s what he’s gonna get.” He’s definitely a hard fucker, but Manny wasn’t worried. “I can take a pounding.” And that he did!
title: Randy & Manny: Bareback
